articles.title: Did Steve Smith remove Rishabh Pant’s guard marks? Extended footage gives fresh perspective - The Indian Express
articles.description: A new video shows that during the break, after which Steve Smith was seen purportedly removing Rishabh Pant's crease mark, ground staff at the SCG had swept the pitch, thus removing all marks anyway.
articles.content: Steve Smith did not scuff Rishabh Pant’s guard marks at his crease, some new footage from the final day of the SCG Test has indicated. The new video shows that during the break, after which Smith was… [+1667 chars]
